attributes.action: Demand Iain Duncan Smith resign over lying to public in DWP sanctions leaflets
attributes.background: The Department of Work and Pensions has admitted that 'case studies' showing the benefits of sanctions on peoples' lives were 'illustrative' only. That is - they were lies. The people described did not exist, the photos were stock images, the stories were fantasy. This is unacceptable.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106396

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
